definitions.text: an irrecoverable state of devastation and destruction
examples: you have brought ruin on this entire family

definitions.text: an event that results in destruction
failure that results in a loss of position or reputation
destruction achieved by causing something to be wrecked or ruined

examples: You have ruined my car by pouring sugar in the tank!
This behavior will ruin your chances of winning the election
My daughter's fancy wedding is going to break me!
The slump in the financial markets smashed him
The country lay ruined after the war
This dirty old man deflowered several young girls in the village
